dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3839367D] Problem
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, April 15, 2007 6:43 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3839367D] Problem ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Problem Added by system at Sunday, Apr 15 2007 03:07 pm X-MailFrom: dreamweaver8484@yahoo.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Apr 15 15:07:10 2007 Received: (qmail 30600 invoked by alias); 15 Apr 2007 20:07:10 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 30597 invoked from network); 15 Apr 2007 20:07:10 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 15 Apr 2007 20:07:10 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 15 Apr 2007 15:07:10 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sun, 15 Apr 2007 15:07:10 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from dreamweaver8484@yahoo.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HdB0A-0004hA-IB for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 15 Apr 2007 15:07:10 -0500 Received: from web57011.mail.re3.yahoo.com ([66.196.97.115]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from dreamweaver8484@yahoo.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HdB05-000A3f-Dm for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 15 Apr 2007 15:07:05 -0500 Received: (qmail 90184 invoked by uid 60001); 15 Apr 2007 20:07:03 -0000 DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=s1024; d=yahoo.com; h=X-YMail-OSG:Received:Date:From:Subject:To:MIME-Version:Content-Type:Co ntent-Transfer-Encoding:Message-ID; b=jhmurdIBHXZ3aEou8lbbACpZJJoLBosXpWaozdRIXc6D1mP7kmfX7BUaSMu/UqSia3k7lE 7SRrCcX/EM88YDKCM5ghDF1wSdj03IRVMsa4GKTNAbgwKxGmtejtm//IOMOx3GuAYWBI+vng QRskfxJGJTOhlBYEupS8nR/zYZZvI=; X-YMail-OSG: rz9BlGoVM1lDa0Zo4GPMGt6tVBe.BBvvvrDxna21wZ4Pszzotfex8CIZCkH5Y7SYSw-- Received: from [24.228.3.188] by web57011.mail.re3.yahoo.com via HTTP; Sun, 15 Apr 2007 13:07:03 PDT Date: Sun, 15 Apr 2007 13:07:03 -0700 (PDT) From: JJ McBride Subject: Problem To: abuse@theplanet.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-1861021417-1176667623=:88934" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Message-ID: <641178.88934.qm@web57011.mail.re3.yahoo.com> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 15 Apr 2007 20:07:10.0815 (UTC) FILETIME=[A6C746F0:01C77F99] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Good day: One of your customers hosting a site at: http://www.gift-malaysia.com/kids/ is totally stealing material from my web site and claiming it as their own. My web site is at: http://www.lensaunders.com/wp/ All the articles located on the first site mentioned are from my site. He is also hot linking images to my site as well as the links still go to my site. Can you do anything. I have tried email and posting to his site a dozen times. Thank you. NickyD --------------------------------- Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell? Check outnew cars at Yahoo! Autos. MIME element (text/html) Good day:
One of your customers hosting a site at:
http://www.gift-malaysia.com/kids/
is totally stealing material from my web site and claiming it as their own.  My web site is at:
http://www.lensaunders.com/wp/
All the articles located on the first site mentioned are from my site.  He is also hot linking images to my site as well as the links still go to my site.  Can you do anything.  I have tried email and posting to his site a dozen times.  Thank you.
NickyD

Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell?
Check out new cars at Yahoo! Autos. MIME element (text/plain)
